story_24_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Sabrina, Fantina, and me—a team made up
entirely of Gym Leaders.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
We’ve battled Elite Four members and some of the
greatest Trainers in the world to make it this far.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Thanks to the two of you, my confidence is shining
brighter than it ever has. I feel like we can take
on anyone!
story_24_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Round three is starting soon, and our opponent
has already been chosen.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
We’re taking on the members of
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Ooh la la! [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team!
I’ve heard about them!
story_24_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Their team is très fantastique! This ensures a
marvelously fun battle!
story_24_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I’ve heard about them, too. It seems they’re
quite strong.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I tried to look into the future to see the outcome
of our battle with them. But for some reason, I
was unable to see the results.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
An unknowable future... We absolutely must not
hold anything back in this battle.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
You promised it beforehand, Sabrina!
You promised to smile more with us!
story_24_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
That’s right. The finals are an enormous stage
with many spectators.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
We don’t have to explode with glamor, but...
we’ve made it to the finals—don’t you think we
should at least give everyone a magnificent smile?
story_24_01000/2401_1001_1600_10: Something like that is...asking a lot from me.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I’m not a dancer or a model. I live in a very
different world than the showy one you two
live in.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: Smiling is not something I’m used to.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_1900_10:
But I’ve wanted to see your smile for such
a long time.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_2100_10:
I’ve had such fun since I joined this team with
you two. I’ve been smiling every day.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_2200_10: That’s why I want you to smile, too, Sabrina!
story_24_01000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Hee hee. Fantina and I are both performers.
We have no trouble expressing what we feel.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
That’s why we’d like you to try it a little, too.
When we win, I’d like to have the whole audience
be captivated by our charm.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_2600_10:
I suppose it wouldn’t be very much like you two
to be satisfied by a victory alone.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Hee hee, we’ll get you to change soon enough,
Sabrina. Before long...
story_24_01000/2401_1001_2800_10:
you’ll be smiling and showing your teeth like you
were a Rattata!
story_24_01000/2401_1001_3000_10: Oh my! What a terrible joke, Elesa. Effroyable.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_3400_10: Ooh la la! Sabrina smiled, non?
story_24_01000/2401_1001_3500_10:
You must say more, Elesa!
Speak more bad jokes, please!
story_24_01000/2401_1001_3700_10:
Leave it to me. All right, this next one’s a bit
more complicated...
story_24_01000/2401_1001_3800_10: Please, no more. This is already too embarrassing.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_4000_10:
Hee hee. What a lovely smile! You’d make a
good performer.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_4100_10:
Say, Sabrina. You said you couldn’t foresee the
outcome of the next match, right?
story_24_01000/2401_1001_4200_10: Even so, I believe in us.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_4300_10:
We’ll win together and wear the biggest smiles
together. We’ll grasp that shining future.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_4500_10:
However, today I saw that shine in
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s eyes...
story_24_01000/2401_1001_4600_10:
I’m sure the next battle will put our bond and
our connection with each other to the test.
story_24_01000/2401_1001_4800_10:
We’re going to utterly captivate everyone in that
stadium with our next battle!
